item.title: Spec atk help
item.dc:creator: @Umah Umah
item.description:
@Umah wrote:

[quote=“kidzcoder, post:1, topic:290144”]in this code what number do i change the 99 to to make it only take half bar and not full

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6999 && specialAmount > 99){
specialAtkNPC(false, 100, 600, 1658);
stillgfx(536, EnemyY, EnemyX);
hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(70);
}

please help[/quote]

Change the 99 to 50.

Read full topic
